channel.title: instruction set architecture on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in instruction set architecture on Notes

item.title: CS137-lecture-20210427
item.description: Instruction set architectures # SIMD = single instruction multiple data RISC = reduced instruction set computer CISC = complex instruction set computer ACC = accumulator Types of instructions # AES = advanced encryption standard High level language program to execution # Instruction cycle # Data path has four main tasks fetch decode execute may access data memory (another cache) write
